title: Data Scientist
description:
This role is for one of the Weekday's clients

The Role

We are seeking a Senior Data Scientist to join our dynamic team and lead the development of machine learning components for our innovative MRV and decarbonization platform. This role will be crucial in integrating advanced AI, satellite remote sensing, and comprehensive carbon footprint tracking to provide a holistic solution for agricultural enterprises, government agencies, and farmers.

Key Responsibilities


Analyze large datasets to identify trends, patterns, and insights.
Develop predictive models using machine learning techniques.
Create visualizations to effectively communicate findings.
Work closely with stakeholders to understand business objectives.
Conduct experiments and A/B testing for data validation.
Design and maintain databases to support data collection and storage.
Collaborate with IT and data engineering teams to enhance data infrastructure.
Monitor model performance and implement improvements.
Implement data mining techniques to extract useful information.
Prepare reports by summarizing data insights and recommendations.
Utilize statistical methodologies for data analysis.
Stay updated with industry trends and new technologies.
Train and mentor junior data scientists and analysts.
Assist in the interpretation of data and sharing insights across teams.
Ensure data quality and integrity throughout the analysis process.


Required Qualifications


Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Data Science, Statistics, Computer Science, or a related field.
Proven experience as a Data Scientist or similar role.
Strong background in statistical analysis and computational techniques.
Proficiency in programming languages, particularly Python or R.
Experience with data visualization tools (e.g., Tableau, Power BI).
Solid understanding of SQL and database management.
Familiarity with big data technologies (e.g., Hadoop, Spark).
Knowledge of machine learning frameworks (e.g., TensorFlow, Scikit-learn).
Excellent problem-solving skills and strategic thinking.
Strong communication skills to effectively present data insights.
Ability to work collaboratively in a team environment.
Experience with data preprocessing and feature engineering.
Ability to handle multiple projects and meet deadlines.
Detail-oriented with a commitment to data integrity.
Prior experience in a specific industry (e.g., finance, healthcare) is a plus.
Continuous learner with a passion for data-driven solutions.
